opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Kathryn A. Panciera, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff-respondent.
Dolbashian, Chappell, Chace & Forte, Paul M. Chappell, Portsmouth, for defendant-petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. William AMARO.
No. 81-38-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Feb. 26, 1981.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Kathryn A. Panciera, Spec. Asst. Atty. Gen., for plaintiff-respondent.
Dolbashian, Chappell, Chace & Forte, Paul M. Chappell, Portsmouth, for defendant-petitioner.
